title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: Upon pressing the finish button, the JAR creation process fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: When using the JAR packager, the application reports open files very late.
EB: After pressing the finish button, the JAR creation process fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
SR: Investigate and fix the issue that causes the JAR packager to report open files late, resulting in a failed JAR creation process.
